bug.short_desc: [1.8] content assist not working inside lambda expression

long_desc.thetext: I'll take a look at this for 4.5 M3.

The recovered parse tree was incorrect and had fragments as well as fuller statements. Fixed via http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?id=04ca8b8834b8d337f24654f163a38f7df436213a.
Note to verifier: Please test the field initialization scenario with similar snippets and raise follow up defects as required - this takes a different path and I didn't quite test it - the reported cases are way more common.
See also https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=435219#c3
Verified for Mars 4.5M2 using I20140915-2000 build.

(In reply to shankha banerjee from comment #3) > Please See: Bug 444300.
This is fixed, thanks.
